remarks: The involution function in a star ring distributes over multiplication, with a change in the order of the factors.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 6-Oct-2015.)
statement:
srngcl.i $e |- .* = ( *r ` R ) $.
srngcl.b $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
srngmul.t $e |- .x. = ( .r ` R ) $.
srngmul $p |- ( ( R e. *Ring /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> ( .* ` ( X .x. Y ) ) = ( ( .* ` Y ) .x. ( .* ` X ) ) ) $.
